title: 我发现我无法使用markdown功能
author: Freeze_Dolphin
txt_content: 上次用markdown功能写插件贴的时候，全文都用markdown，然后上下分别套个markdown标记，结果点发表之后全部变纯文本了 我再试一次： 这不是个水贴 My Signature [![MailMe](https://img.shields.io/badge/Mai ... style=for-the-badge)](http://mail.qq.com/cgi-bin/qm_sh ... kdAbkhBVkNPR0IATUFD) [![LayoutGenerator](https://img.shields.io/badge/Tools-Layout Generator-00EE76?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1077299-1-1.html) [![SafeBackpack](https://img.shields.io/badge/Plugins-Safe Backpack-bcc2c8?style=for-the-badge)](https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-1079724-1-1.html)
